thread.title: Ask the over sixties: what is the secret to long term love?
thread.title_full: Ask the over sixties: what is the secret to long term love?

author: Lauren Alpe
title: Ask the over sixties: what is the secret to long term love?
text:
V alentine's Day is just around the corner, and so today's episode of ‘Ask the over sixties' poses the question; ‘What is the secret to long term love?’
In the video above, our interviewees share their thoughts on how to make love last, with tips including always being honest with your partner, trusting them and never expecting too much.
Contributors share their thoughts on the secret to long term love Credit: Telegraph F ilmed at Age UK’s day centre in Hounslow, previous episodes in this series have focused on ‘What should we all be doing more of?’ and ‘What is the key to happiness?’ 
Future episodes touch on important questions such as ‘Will I ever get over my first love?’ and ‘What is the most important thing in life?’
This series was created with the help of Age UK, the country’s largest charity dedicated to helping everyone make the most of later life.
To find out more information about the great work Age UK are doing in your area you can visit their website. 
Watch | Ask the over sixties: what is the secret to happiness? 01:07
